RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 1 4F Dirt CR: 43. Maiden Claiming Purse 6600. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DA COACH'S WIFE vied inside, drew clear leaving the turn and held safely while kept to task. FORMIDABILE ELLIE vied two across, dropped back entering the stretch, lacked a rally and finished second best. COMPUTER VIRUS settled off the pace while racing within range, lacked a late response and settled for show. EURODOINDONUTS raced in the back in an even effort, lacked a bid and failed to threaten. DREAMING DIVA veered in at the start, trailed inside and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Dreaming Diva
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered in start, trailed inside, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Computer Virus
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, within range, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Da Coach's Wife
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, drew clear leaving turn, held safely

ENTRY.NAME: Formidabile Ellie
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2across, fell back into stretch, no rally, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Eurodoindonuts
ENTRY.COMMENT: in the back, even effort, lacked a bid

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 19250. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of $30,000 At A Mile Or Over In 2022 - 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. (Multiple Winners Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BRODIE BABY pressed the pace while racing two across, rallied on the final turn, assumed command and drew off under mild urging. LACEY BOSS set the pace to the final turn, fell back and was no match for the winner. PEARLY was never far back, raced inside, lacked a bid and held safely for show. STAYTHIRSTYMYAMIGO was unhurried early, trailed the field, offered a mild bid only along the inside and passed a tiring rival. FIGHTINGTEMPTATION raced in the second flight, was through after a half and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Pearly
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, raced inside, lacked a bid, safe for show

ENTRY.NAME: Brodie Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2cross, rallied finali turn, drew off, mild urging

ENTRY.NAME: Lacey Boss
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace to final turn, fell back, no match for winner

ENTRY.NAME: Fightingtemptation
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, through after half, tired, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Staythirstymyamigo
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, trailed, mild bid inside, passed tiring rival

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 3 4F Dirt CR: 52. Maiden Claiming Purse 9900. FOR ACCREDITED OKLAHOMA-BREDS MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Allowed 0 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISTER TYRO came in at the start, set the pace, drew clear on the turn and held under pressure. STORMS LAST pressed the pace along the rail, fell back and shifted out on the turn, closed inside and was outfinished in a game effort. MAJESTIC FLASH pressed the pace, fell back on the turn, swung wide entering the stretch, leveled off and held safely for show. CRYPTO MINER was a bit fractious in the gate, broke slowly, was crowded and steadied at the start, trailed the field and offered a mild bid inside to improve position. HOTTER broke in, flashed speed, dropped back and did not threaten.

ENTRY.NAME: Storms Last
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed rail, shifted out turn, closed inside, outfinished, game

ENTRY.NAME: Crypto Miner
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit fractious gate, broke slowly, crowded, steadied start

ENTRY.NAME: Mister Tyro
ENTRY.COMMENT: came in start, set pace, drew clear turn, held under pressure

ENTRY.NAME: Hotter
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, flashed speed, dropped back, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Majestic Flash
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, fell back turn, swung wide, leveled off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 4 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 44. Maiden Claiming Purse 6600. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BROOKE'S ALL IN bumped at the start, pressed the pace, challenged for the lead on the turn, dueled, inched away and held off the late charge of BRYANS SONG. BRYANS SONG settled off the pace along the inside, angled out on the turn, found her best stride late and got up for place. GOTOTHEWINDOW broke out and bumped at the start, set the pace, responded when challenged to duel, faltered late and lost position. SWEETASLIFECANBE showed good early speed, fell back into the turn and finished evenly.

ENTRY.NAME: Bryans Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled inside, angled out turn, best stride late, up for place

ENTRY.NAME: Gotothewindow
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, bumped start, set pace, faltered late, lost position

ENTRY.NAME: Brooke's All In
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, challenged turn, dueled, inched away, held

ENTRY.NAME: Sweetaslifecanbe
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, fell back into turn, finished evenly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 5 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 64. Allowance Purse 21120. FOR ACCREDITED OKLAHOMA-BREDS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAJESTIC LIAISON was fractious in the gate, vied inside to the turn, inched away briefly, was headed into the stretch, fought back gamely and got up at the wire. TUFF MANDATE was never far back, rallied on the turn, challenged for the lead along the inside, dueled, led late and was outfinished in a good effort. BLAKE FROM TISH lagged early, rallied into the turn to get within range and lacked the needed late response. MINGUS was void of early speed and trailed the field, put in a steady effort and improved position. KICK IT AGAIN BOB vied to the far turn, tired and gave way. PANDEMIC CAT hopped at the start to be off slowly, raced in the back and was outrun in an even effort. WARRIOR'S STAR was through early, tired and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Mingus
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, trailed, steady effort, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Majestic Liaison
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate, vied inside, clear turn, headed, fought back,

ENTRY.NAME: Blake From Tish
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged early, rallied into turn, within range,lacked needed rally

ENTRY.NAME: Tuff Mandate
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied turn, challenged inside, dueled, led late, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Pandemic Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, off slowly, in the back, even effort, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Warrior's Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early, tired, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Kick It Again Bob
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied to far turn, tired, gave way,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 6600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UNITED PATRIOT set a pressured pace, dueled through the stretch and proved best in a long drive. MAGIC CARPET pressed the pace while racing between horses, challenged for the lead on the turn, dueled through the stretch and was outfinished in a good effort. ROCKPORT KAT raced close to the pace towards the outside, fell back on the turn, finished evenly and settled for show. SHANGHAI SKIPPER trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Shanghai Skipper
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed throughout, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: United Patriot
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, dueled stretch, proved best

ENTRY.NAME: Magic Carpet
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed between horses, challenged turn, dueled, outfinished,

ENTRY.NAME: Rockport Kat
ENTRY.COMMENT: close to pace outside, fell back turn, evenly late, safe for show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 70. Allowance Purse 21120. FOR ACCREDITED OKLAHOMA-BREDS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CINCO STEVE raced close to the pace, made a quick move on the turn, assumed command and drew off. HOODOO BROWN was unprepared at the start to be off slowly, was allowed to settle, bid along the rail on the turn and closed to earn place while no threat to the winner. AWESOME OUTLAW raced close to the pace towards the outside, bid three wide on the turn, failed to rally and settled for show. LOCK UP YOUR PETS set the pace to the turn and flattened out.

ENTRY.NAME: Cinco Steve
ENTRY.COMMENT: in close, quick move turn, assumed command, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Outlaw
ENTRY.COMMENT: close to pace outside, bid 3wide turn, no rally, settled for show

ENTRY.NAME: Hoodoo Brown
ENTRY.COMMENT: unprepared start, off slowly, bid rail turn, closed well

ENTRY.NAME: Lock Up Your Pets
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace to turn, flattened out,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 8 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 7150. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FANCY PAYNTER vied inside to the far turn, drew off for a clear lead and held safely under mild urging. SPEND AGAIN was never far back, raced outside, closed steadily and got up for place while no threat to the winner. RIGGED RIGHT stalked the pace, rallied on the turn to loom a threat, bid three wide, lacked the needed late response and was caught for second. WHO'S BIG DADDY was unhurried early, trailed the field while racing far back, advanced on the turn and offered a mild bid only. EASTER JIM swung out entering the first turn, saved ground to the second turn, angled out and lacked a stretch response. MACER THE RACER vied two across to the far turn, tired and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Fancy Paynter
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, drew off far turn, clear lead, mild urging

ENTRY.NAME: Who's Big Daddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, trailed far back, advanced turn, mild bid only

ENTRY.NAME: Easter Jim
ENTRY.COMMENT: swung out into 1st turn,saved ground, angled out 2nd turn, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Macer the Racer
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2across to far turn, tired, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Rigged Right
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied turn, bid 3wide, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Spend Again
ENTRY.OWNER: Hookstra Terry and Pickering James W
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, raced outside, steady close, up for place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR MEADOWS RACE 9 6F Dirt CR: 58. Maiden Special Weight Purse 20460. FOR ACCREDITED OKLAHOMA-BREDS MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Horses That Started For a Claiming Price of $7,500 Or Less In Their Last Three Starts Least Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HERO TIME bumped lightly at the start, vied inside to the far turn, drew clear and was all out at the wire. PONZA bumped at the start, raced close to the pace, fell back on the turn, swung wide entering the stretch, came again and was gaining fast late. MAJESTIC LOVER vied two across to the far turn, fell back, went evenly late and held safely for show. SON OF PREACHERMAN bumped at the start, was never far off the pace, offered a mild bid inside and failed to menace. TRUE DOMINUS was never far back, saved ground, tired into the turn and dropped back. ABES DAY lunged inward at the start to be off slowly, raced far back and passed a tiring rival. GOSPEL GRAYSTONE was a bit fractious in the gate, bumped lightly at the start, raced in the back and showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Hero Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: light bump start, vied to turn, drew clear, all out,

ENTRY.NAME: Gospel Graystone
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit fractious in gate, light bump start, showed little,

ENTRY.NAME: Majestic Lover
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2across to far turn, fell back, evenly late, safe for show

ENTRY.NAME: True Dominus
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, saved ground, tired into turn, dropped back,

ENTRY.NAME: Abes Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunged inward start, off slow, far back, passed tiring rival

ENTRY.NAME: Ponza
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, fell back turn, swung wide, came again, gaining,

ENTRY.NAME: Son of Preacherman
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, never far back, mild bid inside, failed to menace,
